snippet.title: LINE PLAY Introduction (Official Video)_EN
snippet.description: Discover your own special place on LINE PLAY. Create an avatar that looks just like you. Decorate and dress up your avatar with amazing items. Over 20 million new friends are waiting! Let's hang out and party on LINE PLAY!
